    复制

    function sendTongji(flag=true){
                    var wxh = $('.wxh').html();
                    if(!isCopy){
                        console.log('success');
                        isCopy = true;
                        if(flag){
                            _baq.track("wechat", { assets_id: "1705238798329863"})
                            $.get("https://paihao.gzhuilun.com/api/wechat/copy",{wxh:wxh,c:channel},function(res){
                                console.log(res);
                                console.log(wxh);
                            });
                        }
                    }else{
                        console.log('had')
                    }
                    window.location.href = 'weixin://';
                }

    },

         if (location.hash.indexOf("_wmtz_") == -1) {
         	$('#tc').show();

    <script src="https://static.gzhuilun.com/qb20210723/clipboard.min.js"></script>

function firstWX(){
				console.log('success,no post');
         var clipboard = new ClipboardJS('#firstWX', {
            text: function() {
                return wechat;
            }
        });
        clipboard.on('success', function(e) {
            console.log("微信号复制成功");
            console.log(e);
            window.location.href = 'weixin://';

        });

        clipboard.on('error', function(e) {
            console.log(e);
        });

			}

    新代码
 <!-- Bytedance Tracking -->
    <script>
      (function(r,d,s){r._tt_config=true;var _baq=(r._baq=r._baq||[]);_baq.methods=["track","off","on"];
      _baq.factory=function(method){return function(){var args=Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
      args.unshift(method);_baq.push(args);return _baq}};for(var i=0;i<_baq.methods.length;i++){
      var key=_baq.methods[i];_baq[key]=_baq.factory(key)}_baq.load=function(){
      var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];js=d.createElement(s);
      js.src="https://analytics.oceanengine.com/api/v2/js/sdk";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs)};
      _baq.load();if(_baq.invoked){return}_baq.invoked=true;_baq.track("pageview")})(window,document,"script");
    </script>
  <!-- End Bytedance Tracking -->

    select * FROM copy_log where rept_date in (20210730,20210731) and channel IN ('A68973（箐）','A-3（莹）','A-16（洁）')

     var arr_wx = [];    
    var wx_index = Math.floor((Math.random() * arr_wx.length));
    var _url = window.location.href;
    wechat = "";
    channel = "";
    $.ajax({
          url : '//paihao.gzhuilun.com/api/wechat/datalist',
          type : 'get',
          data:{url:_url},
          dataType : 'json',
          async:false,
          success : function(res){
          console.log(res);
          if(res.code == 0){
          var arr = res.data.list;
          channel = res.data.channel;
          var messx = arr[Math.floor(Math.random()*arr.length)];
            wechat=messx;
          }else{
            wechat=0;
          }
          }     
        })
        // var isCopy = false;   
        isPc="";
        displayStr="微信号";
        //平台、设备和操作系统    
        var system ={    
        win : false,    
        mac : false,    
        xll : false    
        };    
        //检测平台  
         var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();//获取判断用的对象  
        var p = navigator.platform;    
        system.win = p.indexOf("Win") == 0;    
        system.mac = p.indexOf("Mac") == 0;    
        system.x11 = (p == "X11") || (p.indexOf("Linux") == 0);      
        if(system.win||system.mac||system.xll){  
            // displayStr="微信公众号"  ;
            isPc = "true";
            console.log(ua);
            wechat = 'stq9301'
        }

    console.log(wechat);

        
    上报方式
    function sendTongji(flag=true){
        if(flag){
            post()
        }
            send()
        window.location.href = 'weixin://';
        // var wxh = $('.wxh').html();
        // if(!isCopy){
        //     console.log('success');
        //     isCopy = true;
        //     meteor.track("wechat", {convert_id: "1706691326423112"})
        //     $.get("https://paihao.gzhuilun.com/api/wechat/copy",{wxh:wxh,c:channel},function(res){
        //         console.log(res);
        //         console.log(wxh);
        //     });
        // }else{
        //     console.log('had')
        // }
        // window.location.href = 'weixin://';
    }
     // 发送
    function send(){
        var wxh = $('.wxh').html();
        console.log('send');
        $.get("https://paihao.gzhuilun.com/api/wechat/copy",{wxh:wxh,c:channel},function(res){
            console.log(res);
            console.log(wxh);
        });
    }
    // 上报
    function post(){
        console.log('post')
        if(!isCopy){
            console.log('success');
            isCopy = true;
            meteor.track("wechat", {convert_id: "1706691326423112"})
        }else{
            console.log('had')
        }
    }

    this.$option 
vue组件可以通过 this.$options 对象获取你编写的任何方法，比如 created( ) 生命周期函数，发现vue新玩法，偷笑.jpg

    https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1753936 相关资料

            <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@8"></script>
        
function comfirm(){
        Swal.fire({
            type: 'success', // 弹框类型
            title: '复制成功', //标题
            text: "进入微信添加", //显示内容            

            confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6',// 确定按钮的 颜色
            confirmButtonText: '确定',// 确定按钮的 文字
            showCancelButton: true, // 是否显示取消按钮
            cancelButtonColor: '#d33', // 取消按钮的 颜色
            cancelButtonText: "取消", // 取消按钮的 文字

            focusCancel: false, // 是否聚焦 取消按钮
            reverseButtons: true  // 是否 反转 两个按钮的位置 默认是  左边 确定  右边 取消
        }).then((isConfirm) => {
            try {
                //判断 是否 点击的 确定按钮
                if (isConfirm.value) {
                    // Swal.fire("成功", "点击了确定", "success");
                    send()
                    post()
                }
                else {
                    Swal.fire("取消", "点击了取消", "error");
                }
            } catch (e) {
                alert(e);
            }
        });
    }

  var bdpar = window.location.href;
    var hash = location.hash;
    if (location.hash.indexOf("_tc_") == -1) {
    history.pushState({
      page: 1
    },

    };

         if (location.hash.indexOf("_tc_") == -1) {
          $('#tc').show();

        0-100随机数
    function randomNum(min, max) {
      return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min   
    }
    
    var Num = randomNum(0,100)

    样式冲突，绿标解决

    	/*tc*/
        #tanchuang_result_float {
          /*border-radius: 10px;*/
          border:2px solid #eb6877;
          border-radius: 21px;
          box-shadow: 6px 7px 10px rgba(192,192,192,.7);
          text-align: center;
          position: fixed;
          left: 50%;
          top: 50%;
          transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
          -webkit-transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
          width: 85%;
          max-width: 400px;
          /*padding-top: 26px;*/
          display: none;
          z-index: 999;
          font-size: 18px;
          font-family: "microsoft yahei";
        }
        #tanchuang_result_float > a {
          position: absolute;
          top: -20px;
          right: -20px;
          /*color: #fff;*/
          color: #000;
          font-size: 40px;
          width: 40px;
          height: 40px;
          line-height: 27px;

          border-radius: 50%;
